name: Baldi's Basics Android The Ultra Decompile V.1.4.1
name_original: Baldi's Basics Android The Ultra Decompile V.1.4.1
description:
This decompiled game has awesome features. The game has three modes. You have 6 item slots. There are more subjects, New characters! (Only two so far, more to come!) and new items! Good luck guys!
Some features on this game:
Minimap. Press M to toggle. Android just press the green up arrow.
Cheats. Press TAB to toggle. Android just press the screen for 15 seconds without moving.
New items.
New characters.
New modes.
New endings.
New events.
New subjects. (Only spelling, science, and english have been added.)
And a lot more!
Looking forward to this game:
I will update some cool stuff and more platforms in the future. For now, it will be like this. I promise it will be an actual ultra decompile.
